case.name: X_process_start
case.description:
Purpose:
Check X is started up.


Run Instructions:
ps aux | grep X

Pass/Fail Criteria:
Get the running Xorg process info

case.name: X_randr_edid
case.description:
Purpose:
Read EDID data through randr extension.


Run Instructions:
xrandr --prop


Pass/Fail Criteria:
Get the EDID data

case.name: X_randr_enable
case.description:
Purpose:
check if RandR extension is enabled in X.


Run Instructions:
Open /tmp/Xorg.0.log, or /var/log/Xorg.0.log, then Check if Randr is enbled.

Pass/Fail Criteria:
Get the string "RandR 1.2 enabled " in Xorg.0.log.

case.name: X_dpms_enable
case.description:
Purpose:
Check if DPMS extension  is enabled in X.


Run Instructions:

cat Xorg.0.log | grep DPMS


Pass/Fail Criteria:

Get the string "DPMS enabled" from Xorg.0.log.

case.name: X_x11perf_rgb10text
case.description:
Purpose:
Test libX11 with rgb 10x10 text render.


Run Instructions:
x11perf -rgb10text

Pass/Fail Criteria:
Rendered correctly, X should not be crashed or hang.

case.name: X_x11perf_aa10text
case.description:
Purpose:
Test libX11 with aa 10x10 text render


Run Instructions:
x11perf -aa10text


Pass/Fail Criteria:
Rendered correctly, X shouldn't be crashed or hang.
